Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Interface SecureInputUi

  • public interface SecureInputUi
    Represents the UI of the secure input.

    Supplies the secure input dialog fragment.

    Allows the application to interact with keypad via methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearInputText()
      Method to Clears the user entered text in text fields.
      androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment getDialogFragment()
      Retrieves the dialog fragment which can either be displayed as a dialog or embedded into screen as component.
      void selectInputField​(int inputField)
      This method should be called when the selected input field on the custom top UI is changed.
      void simulateDeleteButtonPress()
      This method Simulates a touch event for the secure keypad Delete button, when a call is made from the application outside of secure keypad layout
      void simulateOkButtonPress()
      This method Simulates a touch event for the secure keypad Ok button, when a call is made from the application outside of secure keypad layout
      void simulateShiftButtonPress()
      Simulating a touch event for the secure keypad Shift button, when a call is made from the application outside of the secure keypad layout.

    • Method Detail

      • getDialogFragment

        androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment getDialogFragment()
        Retrieves the dialog fragment which can either be displayed as a dialog or embedded into screen as component.
        Returns:
        The dialog fragment. Never null.

      • selectInputField

        void selectInputField​(int inputField)
        This method should be called when the selected input field on the custom top UI is changed. It should only be used in custom top UI implementation.

        Note:
        This method does NOT cause the callback (see the SecureKeypadListener.onInputFieldSelected(int) method) to be triggered.
        Parameters:
        inputField - The index of the input field. For first input field is 0, for second input field is 1.

      • simulateOkButtonPress

        void simulateOkButtonPress()
        This method Simulates a touch event for the secure keypad Ok button, when a call is made from the application outside of secure keypad layout

      • simulateDeleteButtonPress

        void simulateDeleteButtonPress()
        This method Simulates a touch event for the secure keypad Delete button, when a call is made from the application outside of secure keypad layout

      • simulateShiftButtonPress

        void simulateShiftButtonPress()
        Simulating a touch event for the secure keypad Shift button, when a call is made from the application outside of the secure keypad layout.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - is thrown when the secure keypad is not configured for SHIFT support.
        Since:
        6.0

      • clearInputText

        void clearInputText()
        Method to Clears the user entered text in text fields.
